entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Reduce allocations in StreamWriter #76976
  • [API Proposal]: String return from P/Invoke without free #76974
    Future
  • Dynamic PGO startup improvements in NET 8 #76969
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Switch to multi-threaded Emscripten VFS when it is available #76964
  • [wasm-mt] JS Interop should respect GC pauses #76963
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Option to package threaded runtime as CommonJS #76962
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Improved experience when SharedArrayBuffer is not available #76961
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR 7.0 have changed public Debug API. Why? #76960
    7.0.x
  • Support wasm variants in NuGet packages #76959
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Do not allow blocking on the main thread #76958
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] protect pthread workers from unhandled JS exceptions. #76957
    8.0.0
  • JS interop should support threading #76956
    8.0.0
  • Reading all bytes from CryptoStream does not trigger TransformFinalBlock if stream length is a multiple of transform block size #76948
  • Native Runtime Repository Crash Issue #76938
  • PlaceSafepoints pass removed from LLVM #76936
    8.0.0
  • .NET Core WPF app doesn't correctly list NativeReference in manifest file #76934
  • JIT struct work planned for .NET 8 #76931
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly fails to generate trampoline for delegates decorated with `UnmanagedFunctionPointer` #76930
  • Data Corruption With Ref Locals, Punning, and Pinned Object Heap #76929
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Generalized struct promotion #76928
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Move call ABI determination earlier #76926
    8.0.0
  • SPMI does not cleanly record/replay NAOT compilations #76925
    8.0.0
  • Introduce DOTNET_R2RSummary #76922
    Future
  • #SIGSEGV in linux docker since upgrade to 6.0.10 #76921
  • Prevent source-gen from generating code for private fields and those marked with JsonIgnore #76919
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException on decoding base64 bytes with LF characters included (>= .NET 5 only) #76918
  • F# Hello World crash issue #76917
  • StackOverflowException on web project code analysis #76953
  • Need help identifying types which need Custom Converter to be implemented when using System.Text.Json #76914
  • Investigate if crossdac packaging can be built per configuration #76912
    8.0.0
  • Collapse official build legs into one per configuration #76911
    8.0.0
  • Runtime_76346 fails in jitstress on arm64 #76910
    8.0.0

Closed

  • String == ReadOnlySpan<char> is FALSE; Really Bad Design and Needs to be FIX #76735
  • [API Proposal]: Add freezing APIs to JsonTypeInfo #76893
    8.0.0
  • Contract metadata cached by the source generator are user-modifiable. #76535
    7.0.0
  • Double(Single).Parse(string) and Double(Single).Parse(ReadOnlySpan<char) throws different exception for null #76442
  • MonoProxy send stack traces with reference to script that wasn't notified #42340
    8.0.0
  • Annotate unsupported APIs in System.Management #52087
    Future
  • IOCompletionCallback of ThreadPoolBoundHandle causes the app to crash #76852
    8.0.0
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 and .NET 7-preview.7 comparing to .NET 5 when TERM is set to rxvt #75289
    8.0.0
  • AsParallel causes extremely slow 'WorkloadJitting' performance in BenchmarkDotNet benchmark #76689
    Future
  • System.Text.Json code generator creates metadata for classes that are explicitly ignored #76937
  • Serialization of `ReadOnlyMemory<byte>` with `[JsonIgnore]` attribute in .NET 6 and .NET 7 RC1 #76807
    7.0.0
  • Update HTTP/3 docs to 7.0 #76464
    7.0.0
  • [mono][s390x] Wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76915
  • [API Proposal]: Add Constructors to Initialize AsyncLocal<T> to Specified Initial Value #74997
    Future
  • Decimal calculations not rounding to even in all cases #76909

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes typos and formatting in comments #76975
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][PERF][MAUI] Update Maui build Mac vmimage to macos-12 #76973
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Revert "Revert "Reduce CoreCLR PAL"" #76972
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix typo in docs of AdvSimd.Arm64.TransposeOdd #76971
    community-contribution
  • Add Vector128.IsHardwareAccelerated guard for ToBase64CharsLargeNoLineBreaks #76970
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0] Reintroduce typo in ICorDebug public API names #76967
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reintroduce typo in ICorDebug public API names #76966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76955
  • [release/7.0] Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76954
    Servicing-consider
  • [tvOS] Disable crashing test #76952
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove unused code from RegexGenerator #76951
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Disable the hugeexpr1 test failing intermittently with issue #74555 #76950
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add --versiononly argument to R2RDump utility #76947
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76946
    Servicing-consider
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui build mac version #76945
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of Equals* for Vector128 and Vector on Arm64, when LLVM is enabled #76944
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #76942
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Draft fix for a series of multiplications (#75413) #76941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #76940
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, arch-wasm, 7.0.x
  • Use BitOperations in more places #76933
    area-Meta
  • Detriplicate internal SingleProducerSingleConsumerQueue #76932
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/7.0] [mono][s390x] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76920
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Pass-through all `scriptParsed` events, including those with empty URLs #76187
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix reading TestEnv.txt in BionicRunnerTemplate.sh #76927
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove container specification #76943
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • add Alacritty test data for console key parser tests #76935
    area-System.Console, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • De-duplicate Unix Environment variables between Mono and native AOT #76853
  • [mono][s390x] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76916
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Increase distributed transaction test timeout for MSDTC communication failures #76892
    area-System.Transactions
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. (#76540) #76899
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, blocked, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2018912 #76907
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix profiler tail call insertion logic for FIELD_LIST #76883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix usage of implicit pointer types in a few more places… #76878
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • retire EOL Fedora 34 #76902
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix missing dispose on rate limiting #76784
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Only copy coreclr binaries to core_root when targeting coreclr #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add doc describing well-known properties that the host can pass to the runtime #76732
    area-Host
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT webapi use webservice System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Dynamic code generation is not supported on this platform. #2032
  • NativeAOT "Type" is not a supported Runtime Directive IN RD.xml #2031

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: adding LLVM's`unreachable #2028
  • NativeAOT System.TypeLoadException: Could not load type 'System.Net.Quic.Implementations.QuicImplementationProvider' from assembly 'System.Net.Quic, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'. #2033
  • [NativeAOT] System.Reflection.MissingMetadataException How do I write rd.xml #2029
  • [NativeAOT] .NET 7.0 failed to compile : Failed to load type 'System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.IJsonTypeInfoResolver' from assembly 'System.Text.Json, #2030
  • web api An error occurs when visiting a website. How do you locate the error? #2024
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM : cannot get empty string for unbox stub #2027

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: remove an SSA assert for TARGET_WASM #2034

Updated

  • Conservative GC reporting for suspended green threads #2022
  • Green thread objects #2023
  • remove installer leg requirement #2026
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • Instrument RandomAccess.Read/Write for green threads #2020

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1138 should not be raised for libraries #28518
  • SlnFile or similar API should be public #28516
  • Passing MSBuild properties to 'dotnet test' is not working in .NET 7 RC2 #28511

Closed

  • SDK searches for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version 6.0.10 and cannot find it #27888
  • dotnet workload --info does not contain a description #27895
    7.0.2xx
  • NuGet config not copied when running the workload command under sudo on Arm64 #27029
  • crossgen2 doesn't resolve compilers for non-portable rids #28312

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: 2022-09 CTL #28512
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2018954 #28500
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add unit test #28495

Merged

  • [GA / 7.0.1xx Internal -> External Port] Fix SDK Temp Paths #28477
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI, Priority:3, cli-ux
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI, Priority:3, cli-ux
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28474
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stable branding #28485
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. #28380
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28468
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #28470
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28483
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Use latest docker containers #28422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28444
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28445
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28446

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal Question]: Keywordness of `field` #6530

Closed

  • Support classes private to namespaces #6531

PullRequests

Merged

  • ref fields spec updates #6539

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Report use-site error using ref field from type other than `ref struct` in C# #64682
  • Workspace reentrancy with SolutionCrawler and DiagnosticProvider #64681
  • Code folding does not work for anonymous objects #64679
  • Cursor is not changed to "normal" when over new rename UI panel #64677
  • New rename UI target token highlighting is a bit odd #64676
  • New rename UI stops updating the editor state when the textbox is fully cleared #64674
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
  • Ref fields spec doesn't mention how scope flows from lambda to anonymous delegate types #64670
  • Variable names suggestion #64669
  • LSIF Go-to-definition does not work when aliases are involved #64665
    17.5
  • SourceGenerator: No defining declaration found for implementing declaration of partial method #64664
  • Clear build-only diagnostics in the error list for edited documents #64659
    17.5 P1
  • Roslyn/IDE: Add missing usings [multiple suggestions] #64657
  • Delegate type inference from a method group with using static. #64656
    17.5
  • IDE0055: does not provide any control on nested for/foreach/while statements #64654

Closed

  • StackOverflowException in code analyzer for simple class #64392
    17.5
  • No error reported assigning through ref local of ref struct type after ref assigning parameter #62618
    17.5
  • Ref fields spec on re-assignments can be simplified #64671
  • Obsolete-Attribute with interpolated string as message does not raise warnings #64605
    17.5
  • The generate method fix in VB generates a delegate param while AddressOf is not used #64631
  • C# async functions hold onto memory beyond lifetime of function #64607
  • Provide a Class Implementation for an Interface on (ctrl+.) #63874
    Backlog
  • Error when applying the IDE0059 rule on code with simplified 'new' expression #64291
    17.5 P1
  • Improve negation of relational patterns with numeric values in refactorings #64558
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update references to ref fields spec #64686
    Area-Compilers
  • Make titles for IDE0029 and IDE0030 unique #64685
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update M.CA.Testing version to 1.1.2-beta1.22512.1 #64684
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix crash in MetadataAsSource when opening loose (misc) files #64683
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Create source texts for open buffers with the new default source hash algorithm #64668
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS Platform NuGet package version #64667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Set val escape on expression variables (#64414) #64621
    Area-Compilers
  • Save CustomAttributesBag before post decoding well known attributes. #64649
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64678
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)"" #64488
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Skip Workspace ProjectProperties integration test #64673
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix early attribute decoding when an argument is interpolated string #64612
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Make packed LSIF generator behave more like a tool. #64675
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve GenerateMethod for VB implicit call case #64635
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to new image #64472
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not yield the UI thread between an undo unit being created and committed #64651
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Handle implicit object creation in remove unused values code fixer #64662
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Change operator when negating relational patterns with numeric values #64594
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64655
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build. #64650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Load CompletionProvider from references in background" #64648
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Expand IOperation check to lambdas #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IPreviewService async #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Support generated-only symbols in SymbolFinder #63377
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • VB ConvertTupleToStruct should not include NullableAttributes in it #64647
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Test flaky tests #64617
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve customizability of WebAssemblyHostBuilder #44510
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Hosting Service Bus Consumer in a Web API Project #44507
  • Add support for new dialog form method in FormMethod enum #44499
  • Potential optimizations for BufferedReadStream.ReadLine #44498
    Backlog
  • Blazor WebAssembly -AOT - NET 7 Release candidate 2 #44496
  • Blazor WebAssembly - Single Sign Out not working #44495
  • Web API project with RateLimiting middleware - Unhandled exception. System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented #44494
  • UseEndpoints behaves differently in Development and Production env #44491
  • SignalR Clients connection #44489
  • blazor-hotreload.js breaks offline service worker when running from visual studio. #44487

Closed

  • src/Identity/Extensions.Stores/src/IdentityRole.cs Name Should be required and not nullable #44497
  • RDLC work on a Linux based environment #44466
  • Document launchSettings.json #38120
    8.0-preview1
  • Inconsistent null parameter handling with IJsonHelper.Serialize #18243
    Backlog
  • Html.NameFor does not correctly generate name when field has two underscores #18913
    Backlog
  • Asp Net Core Validation Summary #20234
    Backlog
  • generate minlength attribute for input tag-helper #20588
    Backlog
  • Calling AddIdentity().AddDefaultUI() causes custom endpoints to stop working (.NET Core 3.1.4) #22416
    Backlog
  • ErrorViewModel in the default MVC template #23654
    Backlog
  • Enhancement - PartialTagHelper - Simple Child Content / Template #24470
    Backlog
  • Html.DisplayFor ignores subclass display templates for model properties #25955
    Backlog
  • Add asp-append-version support to video > source HTML tag #27074
    Backlog
  • Faulty _ViewStart.cshtml loading for RCL views #27188
    Backlog
  • IOutboundParameterTransformer: add support for QueryString parameters #27646
    Backlog
  • app.Map is broken in .Net 5 RC2 (Blazor) #27202
    Backlog
  • The request matched multiple endpoints after upgrading to 3.0 #18221
    Backlog
  • Endpoint matching ignores host and complex segment prefix when HTTP method does not match #24334
    Backlog
  • Ambiguous routes logged incorrectly #25694
    Backlog
  • ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT value is ignored and HostingEnvironment is always set to production #34799
    Backlog
  • Blazor NotFound returns wrong 200 OK HttpStatusCode #28776
    .NET 8 Planning
  • in Blazor wasm iframe not load the LocalStorage or IndexedDB #44468
  • Tilde ~ in HTML tag path segments of Razor pages breaks hot reload #43450
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cryptography #44490
  • Build release/6.0 branch, restore.cmd fails, dotnet-install cannot download "servicing" versions #43133

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android PopModalAsync still fails when popping a NavigationPage after latest review update (.NET 7) #10656
  • Default VS symbol loading mechanism does not work #10654
  • Attached Property Errors #10652
  • [Windows] Image is not centered in AspectFill mode #10645
    Backlog
  • Validate Windows buttons have round corners #10644
    7.0
  • Frame.CornerRadius not working on iOS #10643
    Backlog
  • [Android] Multiple navigation bars appear for FlyoutPage (MAUI ver. 6.0.541) #10634
  • CollectionView with ItemTemplate containing Images with UriImageSource throws TaskCanceledException when scrolling #10632
    Backlog
  • UI not adapting size on macOS (when resizing) and iPad (when rotated) #10631
  • [WinUI] Flashy backgrounds on start #10629
  • Lottie animation not visible on Page from ServiceProvider #10628
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error “The Xcode license status couldn't be verified because Xcode has not been found...” #10627
  • Assembly 'Microsoft.Maui' Version=1.0.0.0 uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=16.0.0.0 which has a higher version than referenced assembly 'Microsoft.iOS' 15.4.300.0 -- FAILED. #10626

Closed

  • Symbols missing for 7.0.0-rc.2 #10650
  • Shadow Radius is rendered differently on platforms #10630
  • Label.LineBreakMode = TailTruncation not working properly on iOS & macOS #10633
  • ToolbarItem's IconImageSource : Dynamic source change from embedded image resource bug. #10648
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.VersionTracking.Default throws exception #10499
  • The ResourceDictionary has duplicate template options #10202
    7.0
  • Line coordinates are not respected #10415
    Backlog
  • Shapes are top-left aligned #9089
    7.0
  • Directory Not Found of DLL from .Net MAUI class library in folder Debug\net6.0-android\android-x64 #10150
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar background color is not working #10482
    Backlog
  • MAUI should not use private targets from iOS build tasks #10272
    7.0
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain version 6.0.10... is not found in NuGet feeds" #10600
    Backlog
  • Windows Publish failing with WindowsPackageType is set to None, but PublishAppxPackage is set to true. #10576

PullRequests

Created

  • Always disconnect when handler changes #10655

  • Make IsTrimmable=False in all assemblies that have no value #10647

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.8 to 6.0.10 #10640
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10639
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10638
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.8 to 6.0.10 #10637
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10636
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22504.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22511.2 #10642
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tests] Ignore tooltip tests #10649
  • Fix top-left aligned shapes issue #10417
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1343.22 to 1.0.1370.28 #10606

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy loading of Related Data with proxies: Query Asynchronously #29333
  • Static entities and cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{Id: }' is already being tracked. #29332
  • Referencing EntityFrameworkCore.Design in .NET MAUI Application results in build error #29335
  • More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances have been created for internal use by Entity Framework. #29330

Closed

  • Accessing properties of result selected with First/FirstOrDefault #29304
  • Attempting GroupBy navigation property throws internal KeyNotFoundException #29199
    7.0.0
  • Query: Support GroupBy when it is final operator #19929
    7.0.0
  • Add a custom collection interface with an `IsLoaded` property. #29256
  • EF Core automatically creates expensive database when executing migrations #29251
  • `ExecuteUpdate` with `Dictionary<string, object?>` update condition #29247
  • IdentityMap still referenced in StateManager after DbContexts has been returned to DbContextPool #29098
  • FromSqlRaw + OwnedEntity + Where on PK throws #29317
  • Ef Core 7 RC2 NamingConvention get_EntityTypeAddedConventions method not found #29327

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Stabilize versions #29328
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Clean up stored procedure tests as NonSharedModelTestBase #29331
    tell-mode, auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29326
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29325
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
